meanings.sent1: The waistcoated man looked very stylish at the party.
meanings.sent2: She admired the waistcoated gentleman's fashion sense.
meanings.sent3: The waistcoated cat strutted around like a little gentleman.
meanings.sent4: The waistcoated tree stood out among the others in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The waistcoated penguin waddled proudly on the ice.

meanings.definition: Covered or adorned with a waistcoat.
meanings.sent1: The waistcoated chair added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The waistcoated horse trotted gracefully in the field.
meanings.sent3: The waistcoated car looked like it was dressed up for a special occasion.
meanings.sent4: The waistcoated bookshelf stood out in the antique shop.
meanings.sent5: The waistcoated statue in the park caught the attention of many visitors.
